alert.note: Alert for Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 22 at 1:44AM PST until January 23 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Yosemite NP outside of the valley, Upper San Joaquin River, Kings Canyon NP, Sequoia NP and South End of the Upper Sierra. * WHEN...From 1 PM PST this afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
